segments.text: I messed up my mid-term exam so badly today !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's just one exam . Can you re-take the exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but it's so humiliating ! I don't want my friends to know I failed !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why didn't you do a good job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I sat down in my seat , looked at my paper , and then my mind just went totally blank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you think you studied enough for the exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what did you do last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you study at all last night for your exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sure if you had studied , you would have done well . When can you re-take your exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: alright . Get out your books and I'll help you prepare .
segments.speaker: S1
